description:
At the law office of Hardy Marble LLP in Lockport, New York, we are prepared to help you with virtually any legal challenge affecting your life, your livelihood, your business and your future. Although we focus primarily on personal injury and injured workers' claims, our law firm offers exceptional representation in a variety of practice areas, so you can find the quality, effective legal counsel you need all under one roof.

Through our personal injury practice, we handle all types of claims arising from someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, including motor vehicle accidents, slip-and-fall accidents, construction accidents, medical malpractice and nursing home abuse, dog bites, and other preventable tragedies. In addition, we also serve injured and disabled employees to help them obtain their rightful workers' compensation and Social Security Disability benefits.

Our law firm's general practice runs the gamut of legal areas, and we can help you address virtually any legal matter you may face involving business and corporate law, intellectual property protections, real estate, criminal and DUI defense, family law, animal welfare law, estate planning, immigration, tax law, and more.

In every case, we are all about results, and we promise to do whatever we can to help you achieve the solutions and outcomes you seek as efficiently as possible. Each of our founding attorneys has extensive legal experience, and through our efforts, we have helped establish our law firm as one of the leading full-service practices in Niagara and Erie counties and the greater Buffalo area.

To begin receiving the personal attention you deserve from a local attorney you can trust to advocate strongly on your behalf toward helping you achieve the favorable outcomes you expect, you can contact Hardy Marble LLP by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule a free initial consultation.
